intro.content: The idea for a fitness application popped up in my mind during the Covid-19 pandemic. The idea was to design a hassle free fitness iOS app that lets you track you your fitness and health information without having to worry about data privacy issues.

spmList.name: Exercise recommendation based on the BMI count
Diet Recommendation based on various days of the week
Made with iOS Design Rules in mind

description.content:
The idea was started as a UI/UX Design concept project which took shape into a finished deployable android application. This was my first full fledged application project as a UI/UX Designer that was designed with an aim to achieve a Market-ready Product. 
 Here is the link to the figma design file.
